languages.text: {n}Маражай ухмыляется.{/n} "Да. Оружие слишком долго покоится в ножнах".

traits.locale_text: {n}Маражай ухмыляется.{/n} "Да. Оружие слишком долго покоится в ножнах".

languages.text: {n}Marazhai grins.{/n} "Indeed. My weapons have been sheathed for too long."

languages.text: {n}Marazhai grinst.{/n} "In der Tat. Meine Waffen sind schon viel zu lange nicht im Einsatz gewesen."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai grins.{/n} "Indeed. My weapons have been sheathed for too long."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai grinst.{/n} "In der Tat. Meine Waffen sind schon viel zu lange nicht im Einsatz gewesen."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋笑了起来。{/n}“没错，我的战刀已经太久没出鞘了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai grins.{/n} "Indeed. My weapons have been sheathed for too long."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋笑了起来。{/n}“没错，我的战刀已经太久没出鞘了。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai sourit de toutes ses dents.{/n} « En effet. Mes armes dorment depuis trop longtemps. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai grins.{/n} "Indeed. My weapons have been sheathed for too long."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai sourit de toutes ses dents.{/n} « En effet. Mes armes dorment depuis trop longtemps. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai sonríe.{/n} «Desde luego. Mis armas llevan envainadas demasiado tiempo».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai grins.{/n} "Indeed. My weapons have been sheathed for too long."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai sonríe.{/n} «Desde luego. Mis armas llevan envainadas demasiado tiempo».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}マラズハイがにやりと笑う。{/n}「その通り。俺の武器が出番を待ってうずうずしているぜ」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai grins.{/n} "Indeed. My weapons have been sheathed for too long."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイがにやりと笑う。{/n}「その通り。俺の武器が出番を待ってうずうずしているぜ」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai sırıtıyor.{/n} "Kesinlikle. Silahlarım fazla uzun süredir kınlarında."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai grins.{/n} "Indeed. My weapons have been sheathed for too long."
